title: How to Run Ads on Instagram - Complete Instagram Ads Tutorial
description:
Run Instagram Ads using Facebook.  Don't use the promote button on Instagram to run ads.  That option is very limited and you'll get better results on Facebook.

Facebook owns Instagram and they share the same ad platform.

The Instagram and Facebook ad platform is broken up into 3 parts.  The campaign, Ad Set, and Ads.

To run Instagram ads, you should set up a Facebook Business Manager account.
You can sign up for one here:
https://business.facebook.com/

If you want to create an effective video ad for Instagram, watch the how-to create Instagram ads video:
https://youtu.be/HDSjLy-X_Nw

You can run Instagram ads without this with a personal ad account, but this will help you expand in the future and keep things much more organized.

Once you create a Facebook business manager and fill out your information, you can go to your ad account and create a campaign.
Choose a campaign goal based on your intent.  You can choose reach or brand awareness if you are just trying to get eyeballs on your post.

Consideration campaigns are best for sending people to a website, to get video views, or simply as a lead generation tool.

Conversation campaigns really track the end results from your Instagram ads and are best for tracking sales.

Once you create your campaign, you'll select ad sets.  This is your targeting on who will see your ads.  You can choose by location, age, gender, interest, activity and the countless number of settings to laser focus your targeting.
You can also set your budget and duration of your Instagram ad, here.

The final step is creating your actual ad.  This is the ad creative from the title, to the description to photo or video that you'll use in your ad.

During the entire setup process, look at your potential reach.  This is the total number of people your Instagram ad can reach based on many factors through the setup process. You want this to not be too specific and not too broad.

Thank you for watching this video! Please share and subscribe for more, easy-to-follow social media and tech videos.

title: The BEST way to run instagram ads in 2023
description:
This method works way better than just going right for the sale, and itâ€™s all about the ad type, which is reels, and putting yourself in front of them over and over again. 

I call this my Omnipresent Reels Strategy. ğŸ˜

First, create one specific Reel ad to attract your ideal customers. It wonâ€™t look like an ad at all, it should just be content-based, on a topic that resonates with them, thats closely related to your offer. 

Then retarget anyone who watches it for over 3 seconds with a variety of Reels to hit different psychological triggers. Include a couple how-to, or tip reels, a couple advice-style reels, and a more inspirational one letting them know whatâ€™s possible. 

This approach works better than just throwing out a single ad and hoping it hits.

Keep the targeting wide open, and set the campaign engagement type to video views with a total budget of around $10 a day.

title: Learn Paid Ads in 30 Minutes!
description:
Download your free scaling roadmap here: https://www.acquisition.com/roadmap-yt-d
The easiest business I can help you start (free trial): https://www.skool.com/hormozi
Business owners: Want to scale faster? We provide in-person advisory for companies doing at least $1M per year: https://www.acquisition.com/workshop-yt

If youâ€™re new to my channel, my name is Alex Hormozi. Iâ€™m the founder and managing partner of Acquisition.com. Itâ€™s a family office, which is just a formal way of saying we invest our own money into companies. Our 10 portfolio companies bring in over $250,000,000+ per year. Our ownership stake varies between 20% and 100% of them. Given this is a YT channel, and anyone can claim anything, Iâ€™ll give you some stuff you can google to verify below.

How I got hereâ€¦

21: Graduated Vanderbilt in 3 years Magna Cum Laude, and took a fancy consulting job.
23 yrs old: Left my fancy consulting job to start a business (a gym).
24 yrs old: Opened 5 gym locations.
26 yrs old: Closed down 6th gym. Lost everything. 
26 yrs old: Got back to launching gyms (launched 33). Then, lost everything for a 2nd time. 
26 yrs old: In desperation, started licensing model as a hail mary. It worked. 
27 yrs old: "Gym Launch" does $3M profit the next 6 months. Then $17M profit next 12 months.
28 yrs old: Started Prestige Labs. $20M the first year.  
29 yrs old: Launched ALAN, a software company for agencies to work leads for customers. Scaled to $1.7mmo within 6 months. 
31 yrs old: Sold 75% of UseAlan to a strategic buyer in an all stock deal. 
31 yrs old: Sold 66% of Gym Launch & Prestige Labs at $46.2M valuation in all-cash deal to American Pacific Group. (you can google it)
31 yrs old: Started our family office Acquisition.com. We invest and scale companies using the $42M in distributions we had taken + the cash from the $46.2M exit.
32 yrs old: Started making free content showing how we grow companies to make real business education accessible to everyone (and) to attract business owners to invest or scale their businesses. 
34 yrs old: I became co-owner of https://Skool.com to help the many people who want to start a business online do so.

Today: Our portfolio now does $200M/yr between 10 companies. The largest doing $100M/yr the smallest doing $5M per year. Our ownership varies between 20% and 100% ownership of the companies. Many of them we invested in early and helped grow (which is how we make our money - not youtube videos).

To all the gladiators in the arena, weâ€™re all in the middle of writing our own stories. The worse the monsters, the more epic the story.

You either get an epic outcome or an epic story. Both mean you win. 

Keep crushing. May your desires be greater than your obstacles. 

Never quit,

Alex

If youâ€™re new to my channel, my name is Ben Heath. Iâ€™m the founder and owner of https://heathmedia.co.uk/?el=YTLong-newwayIGfollowers1023-home a marketing agency that offers done-for-you services, coaching and educational resources, all with the objective of delivering exceptional marketing results for our clients and customers.

Over the past 9 years weâ€™ve spent more than Â£50,000,000 on paid social ad campaigns generating more than Â£200,000,000 in revenue.

Weâ€™ve worked with more than 2,000 businesses directly from all over the world and in just about every niche you can think of. And weâ€™ve helped educate hundreds of thousands of business owners, marketers and entrepreneurs.

How I got hereâ€¦

17 yrs old: Started my first business selling wristbands with two school friends. I made $0.
18 yrs old: Started my first ecommerce business selling second hand video games. I made $0.
19 yrs old: Joined a network marketing company (would not recommend it). Was told Iâ€™d be rich if I signed up 8 people. I signed up 26 people in 3 months. I made $0.
21 yrs old: Dropped out of Bath University to start an app development company. I made less than $5,000 in 2 years!
23 yrs old: Started Heath Media, my marketing agency. I made $0 for the first 3 years.
26 yrs old: Went all in on building a personal brand within the marketing space. I passed $100k/year.
28 yrs old: My personal brand allowed me to attract the best talent in the world. Heath Media became an industry leading Meta ads agency, with an exceptional team and an excellent reputation. We crossed $1m/year.
31 yrs old: Today I teach over 800,000 business owners, marketers and entrepreneurs how to get insane results with digital marketing. Heath Media is a 50+ team of world class talent, working directly with over 400 clients every year. Weâ€™ve now crossed the $5m/year mark.

To all the struggling marketers and entrepreneursâ€¦ I was an entrepreneur for 9 years before I could even pay the bills with my own business. 5 years after that I have more success and more fun than I could have ever dreamed of.

It takes perseverance, analysis and learning from the right person.

If you took the time to read this far, you have what it takes to crush it with your marketing. 

I hope to help you speed up that journey and come along for the ride.

Keep going,

Ben

title: How and Why to Create an Effective Instagram Ad ğŸ›’
description:
Did you know that 33% of people have purchased something directly from an Instagram ad they saw? 

That's a huge number, and it shows that Instagram ads are a powerful way to reach your target audience and drive sales.

If you're not already using @instagram ads, you're missing out on a great opportunity to connect with your customers and grow your business. 

Here are a few tips for creating effective Instagram ads:

ğŸï¸ Use high-quality images and videos that will capture your audience's attention.
âœğŸ¼ Write clear and concise ad copy that tells your audience what you're offering and why they should buy it.
ğŸ¯ Target your ads to your ideal customers based on their interests, demographics, and even past purchase history.
ğŸ—£ï¸ Use a call to action to tell your audience what you want them to do, such as visit your website or sign up for your email list.

By following these tips, you can create Instagram ads that are effective and profitable.

description:
Running ads on Instagram is a powerful way to reach your target audience and promote your brand. To get started, you'll need to create a business account and connect it to your Facebook page. Iâ€™m the founder and owner of https://heathmedia.co.uk/?el=YTshorts-home a marketing agency that offers done-for-you services, coaching and educational resources, all with the objective of delivering exceptional marketing results for our clients and customers.

Over the past 9 years weâ€™ve spent more than Â£50,000,000 on paid social ad campaigns generating more than Â£200,000,000 in revenue.

Weâ€™ve worked with more than 2,000 businesses directly from all over the world and in just about every niche you can think of. And weâ€™ve helped educate hundreds of thousands of business owners, marketers and entrepreneurs.

How I got hereâ€¦

17 yrs old: Started my first business selling wristbands with two school friends. I made $0.
18 yrs old: Started my first ecommerce business selling second hand video games. I made $0.
19 yrs old: Joined a network marketing company (would not recommend it). Was told Iâ€™d be rich if I signed up 8 people. I signed up 26 people in 3 months. I made $0.
21 yrs old: Dropped out of Bath University to start an app development company. I made less than $5,000 in 2 years!
23 yrs old: Started Heath Media, my marketing agency. I made $0 for the first 3 years.
26 yrs old: Went all in on building a personal brand within the marketing space. I passed $100k/year.
28 yrs old: My personal brand allowed me to attract the best talent in the world. Heath Media became an industry leading Meta ads agency, with an exceptional team and an excellent reputation. We crossed $1m/year.
31 yrs old: Today I teach over 800,000 business owners, marketers and entrepreneurs how to get insane results with digital marketing. Heath Media is a 50+ team of world class talent, working directly with over 400 clients every year. Weâ€™ve now crossed the $5m/year mark.

To all the struggling marketers and entrepreneursâ€¦ I was an entrepreneur for 9 years before I could even pay the bills with my own business. 5 years after that I have more success and more fun than I could have ever dreamed of.

It takes perseverance, analysis and learning from the right person.

If you took the time to read this far, you have what it takes to crush it with your marketing. 

I hope to help you speed up that journey and come along for the ride.

Ben

how can i run instagram ads for business

Want to promote your brand or product on Instagram? This quick guide will show you step-by-step how to run Instagram ads directly from the app using posts, stories, or reels.

0:00 â€“ Intro: How to run Instagram ads for business
0:03 â€“ Ensure you have a stable internet connection
0:06 â€“ Open your Instagram app
0:09 â€“ Tap your profile icon (bottom right corner)
0:12 â€“ Make sure your account is set to â€œProfessionalâ€
0:16 â€“ Tap the â• icon (bottom middle or top right)
0:20 â€“ Select â€œAdâ€ from the options
0:23 â€“ Choose content: post, story, or reel to promote
0:28 â€“ Tap â€œNextâ€ after selecting the content
0:32 â€“ Choose what you want people to do when they see your ad (visit website, visit profile, or message you)
0:39 â€“ Select an action button (e.g., Learn More, Shop Now, etc.)
0:42 â€“ Tap â€œSave,â€ then â€œNextâ€
0:45 â€“ Choose your audience: use suggested or create your own
0:50 â€“ Tap â€œNextâ€
0:52 â€“ Set your ad budget (daily amount)
0:55 â€“ Set duration for how long your ad will run
0:58 â€“ Tap â€œNextâ€ again
1:01 â€“ Review your ad and add your payment method
1:06 â€“ Tap â€œBoost Postâ€ to start running your Instagram ad
1:10 â€“ Done! Your ad is now live and reaching new customers
1:15 â€“ Recap and final tips
1:21 â€“ You can monitor ad performance under your profileâ€™s â€œAd Toolsâ€ section

title: How To Run Instagram Ads For Shopify In 2025 (Step By Step)
description:
Running Instagram ads for your Shopify store involves several strategic steps to maximize your reach and conversions. Begin by defining your target audience through Instagram's robust demographic tools. Next, create visually appealing ad content that aligns with your brand identity, showcasing your products effectively. 

Utilize Instagram's shopping features to tag products directly in your ads, streamlining the purchasing process. Set a clear budget and choose between various ad formats, such as stories or carousel ads, to engage users. Regularly analyze ad performance using Instagram Insights, adjusting your strategy as needed to improve ROI and drive traffic to your Shopify store.

title: The New Rules of SEO (2026)
description:
You're showing up in Google but your customers are making decisions somewhere else.

TikTok. Reddit. Amazon. ChatGPT. These are the new "search engines" and most marketers haven't caught up. In this video, I break down one of the biggest shifts in internet history: why ranking no longer equals revenue and what to do instead.

If your traffic looks fine but conversions are flat... you might be stuck in what I call The Google Trap. You're optimizing for visibility while customers are deciding in totally different places.

This isn't about doing more. It's about showing up where decisions actually happen.

You'll learn why 73% of modern "search" happens outside of Google, how consumers now make decisions across TikTok, Reddit, ChatGPT, Amazon and more, what "Search Everywhere Optimization" really means and how to do it, the key difference between visibility and validation, and why being trusted on 1-2 platforms beats being visible on 10.

Whether you're a founder, CMO, or just trying to get marketing results again, this is the new playbook. Watch now and start showing up where your customers actually choose.

title: YouTube SEO: How to Rank YouTube Videos #1
description:
In this video, youâ€™ll learn how to do YouTube SEO to rank your videos #1 in YouTube search.

***************************************
Additional YouTube SEO Resources

YouTube Keyword Research: How to Get More Views Consistently â–º https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kAuM2nQb_P8

Video SEO: How to Rank YouTube Videos on the First Page of Google (Fast) â–º https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BObU_VCwnvY

How Accurate is Google Keyword Planner? â–º https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HDFQlxIfgHY

How to use Google Ads to Improve SEO â–º https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iZwr2mAmIxE

YouTube SEO / Video Marketing [playlist] â–º https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLvJ_dXFSpd2tsn8vwEmhFM0McBH4PhEty

***************************************
Using these exact tips, weâ€™ve managed to rank #1 for some of the most valuable keywords in our niche.

YouTube SEO is important because: 

â–º Views from YouTube search are consistent. This also helps you get more YouTube subscribers consistently. 
â–º Search views have high average view durations.
â–º Search views donâ€™t require an existing audience or library of videos like Browse features and suggested views. 

Here are the YouTube SEO tips and processes thatâ€™ll help you rank your videos #1.

The first step is to do YouTube keyword research. Youâ€™ll need to start with generating a list of keyword ideas.

Youâ€™ll learn about the tools and processes that help you with this from the video.

Second, you need to choose a topic you want to go after. Here youâ€™ll need a brainstormed keyword list from the last step.

Watch the video to learn more about choosing your topic.

The next step will be to create a high-performing video. In short, itâ€™s a video that will have high retention, high average view duration, and high CTR. Here, you may want to script your content to organize the structure of your videos and retain peopleâ€™s attention spans.

In the next step, youâ€™ll need to optimize your video for YouTube. There are 7 important things youâ€™ll need to do to improve video SEO on YouTube. These 7 tips are shared as a checklist in the video. 

When youâ€™ve done all of these things, then promotion is pretty straightforward. Watch the video to get more ideas on promoting your optimized videos and getting more views.

Discover the power of SEO and learn what is SEO  with our comprehensive video, guiding you from beginner to advanced level to optimize your online presence. 
This video will help you understand SEO - Search Engine Optimization. SEO or Search Engine Optimization is a technique that enables you to get more organic traffic to your website. There are two types of SEO - On page SEO and Off Page SEO. Watch this video on SEO to understand Jow SEO Works in a fun and easy way.  

Below topics are explained in this SEO tutorial:
SEO 00:00
1. What is SEO? 00:32
2. On-Page SEO 01:00
3. Off-Page SEO 02:27
4. How does SEO work?

What is SEO?
Search Engine Optimization or SEO is the practice of increasing organic traffic on the Search Engine Results Page (SERP). It is also known as organic search or listings. If you want to rank number one for all the keywords, you need to apply SEO to increase your rank.

Types of SEO:-
1) On-page SEO
On-page SEO is the process of optimizing website elements. When you do this, there are certain factors that you need to take into account. All these elements are something that you can control as an end-user.

2) Off-page SEO
Off-page SEO is another process of improving your rank on the search engine results page. It also helps to strengthen the credibility of your website and build a sense of domain authority and trustworthiness. Other benefits of off-page SEO are an increase in traffic, page rank, and brand awareness.

title: The New Rules of SEO (2026)
description:
You're showing up in Google but your customers are making decisions somewhere else.

TikTok. Reddit. Amazon. ChatGPT. These are the new "search engines" and most marketers haven't caught up. In this video, I break down one of the biggest shifts in internet history: why ranking no longer equals revenue and what to do instead.

If your traffic looks fine but conversions are flat... you might be stuck in what I call The Google Trap. You're optimizing for visibility while customers are deciding in totally different places.

This isn't about doing more. It's about showing up where decisions actually happen.

You'll learn why 73% of modern "search" happens outside of Google, how consumers now make decisions across TikTok, Reddit, ChatGPT, Amazon and more, what "Search Everywhere Optimization" really means and how to do it, the key difference between visibility and validation, and why being trusted on 1-2 platforms beats being visible on 10.

Whether you're a founder, CMO, or just trying to get marketing results again, this is the new playbook. Watch now and start showing up where your customers actually choose.

This video will help you understand SEO - Search Engine Optimization. SEO or Search Engine Optimization is a technique that enables you to get more organic traffic to your website. There are two types of SEO - On page SEO and Off Page SEO. Watch this video on SEO to understand Jow SEO Works in a fun and easy way.  

Below topics are explained in this SEO tutorial:
SEO 00:00
1. What is SEO? 00:32
2. On-Page SEO 01:00

4. How does SEO work?

What is SEO?
Search Engine Optimization or SEO is the practice of increasing organic traffic on the Search Engine Results Page (SERP). It is also known as organic search or listings. If you want to rank number one for all the keywords, you need to apply SEO to increase your rank.

Types of SEO:-
1) On-page SEO
On-page SEO is the process of optimizing website elements. When you do this, there are certain factors that you need to take into account. All these elements are something that you can control as an end-user.

2) Off-page SEO
Off-page SEO is another process of improving your rank on the search engine results page. It also helps to strengthen the credibility of your website and build a sense of domain authority and trustworthiness. Other benefits of off-page SEO are an increase in traffic, page rank, and brand awareness.

title: YouTube SEO: Get More Video Views from Search #shorts
description:
By using YouTube SEO best practices your videos will show up in more search results in both YouTube and Google search. Here are 5 YouTube SEO tips to help you rank your videos in search. 

YouTube SEO #shorts version

YouTube SEO: How to Rank YouTube Videos in 2020
https://youtu.be/ahrZpXfnRKo

How to Make a Thumbnail for YouTube Videos for Free with Canva
https://youtu.be/kv0nTvCcHlg

Fix These Audience Retention Mistakes & Get More Watch Time
https://youtu.be/rYr2t0Z_Hck

Do YouTube Tags Help You Get More Views in 2020?
https://youtu.be/ao6oQu8zKTI

Free YouTube SEO Tools
VidIQ: https://vidiq.com
Ahrefs YouTube Keyword Tool: https://ahrefs.com/youtube-keyword-tool


6 YouTube Video SEO Tips:

1. Find topics with high search volume through keyword research. We recommend using VidIQâ€™s free Chrome plugin and Ahrefs YouTube Keyword Tool (both free).

2. Tell YouTube what your video is about. By using the keyword and other similar phrases in the video title, description, and tags, you help YouTubeâ€™s algorithm understand what your video is about so it knows who to initially show your video to.

3. Get people to click on your videos. Click through rate (CTR) is one of the most important YouTube metrics. Check out our YouTube thumbnail video listed above for help creating videos that people click on helping you get more video views.

4. Keep people watching videos on YouTube. Audience retention is very important for your videos. If you can retain your audience and get lots of watch time on each of your videos, YouTube will show your videos to more people.

5. Get people to interact with your content. When you get someone to like, comment or subscribe while watching one of your videos, that sends a signal to YouTube that people enjoy your content. If itâ€™s clear that people enjoy consuming your content, YouTube will find more people to show your videos to.

6. Drive traffic to your videos within the first 24-48 hours. We share our videos on the YouTube community tab and our email list within a few hours of publishing a new video. We also share our videos on all of your social media channels such as Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, and Pinterest.

title: YouTube SEO Isnâ€™t Just About Keywords
description: Ranking on YouTube takes more than stuffing tags or tweaking your title. It's about how long people watch, how often they click, and whether your content actually delivers on what the searcher wants. High watch time and retention are your real SEO engines. If people click but bounce, the algorithm stops pushing. Focus on relevance, structure, and holding attention to grow consistently.

title: Do Likes, Comments, & Shares Factor into YouTube SEO?
description:
Do you need to get a lot of likes, comments, and shares on your video in order for it to rank well in search results? Does Google even look at that info to determine how to rank a video? It turns out that, while those things may indirectly influence how a video ranks, Google doesn't directly factor in those signals. In this video I explain why they don't and how they still may influence your video's SEO value.

description:

How to use Video Marketing to Grow Your Business â–º https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QCgDIhvFkCM

Iâ€™m sure youâ€™ve noticed that videos have been appearing more and more in Googleâ€™s search results. In fact, SEO statistics show that video carousels nearly doubled in the SERPs in 2017.

This is why you should be focusing on video SEO. 

What is video SEO? 

Video SEO is different from YouTube SEO. Video SEO is the process of increasing visibility and rankings in search engines like Google. Whereas YouTube SEO is the process of increasing visibility and rankings in YouTube search. The good news: properly optimized videos 

The good news is that properly optimized videos for Google can also rank in YouTube and vice versa, with just a few additional things.

So, how do you rank your YouTube videos on Google? 

The first step is to find video topics with ranking and traffic potential.  

Google ranks content that best serves a userâ€™s query. And generally speaking, if videos are ranking high or are prominent in the SERPs, itâ€™s a sign that creating a video on this topic has the potential to get views from Google.

And in this video, youâ€™ll learn three ways to find video topics with both ranking and traffic potential. 

Step 2 is to create an optimized video. 

You probably already know the basics of video optimization. Your videos need to engage your audience, i.e., long watch times, high audience retention, and boast-worthy session watch times. 

But something a lot of creators forget is that the Internet is more or less text-based. So if Google, YouTube or any other search engine canâ€™t interpret the text attached to your video, then youâ€™ll never rank your videos on YouTube or Google. 

If you want to optimize your videos (and not just for engagement), youâ€™ll have to give as much context as possible to search engines. And the way you do that boils down to the words spoken in the video, matching visuals, and metadata. 

While theyâ€™re easy to implement, they do require some planning. And in this tutorial, youâ€™ll learn some strategies on how to do this. 

The third step is to add closed captions to your instructional videos. 

Remember: we want to help YouTube and Google understand the contents of our video as much as possible.

And since the words that are spoken can easily be transcribed to text, this is probably the best and easiest way to add context to your video. 

Youâ€™ll learn how to do this in the video. 

Step 4 is to create an enticing thumbnail.

Itâ€™s no secret that great thumbnails lead to more clicks. So, youâ€™ll learn a couple of cool tips on how to make a compelling thumbnail that gets viewers to click. 

Finally, the last step is to add timestamps to your videos. This can help you get the â€œkey momentsâ€ feature on Google.

Key moments is a new SERP feature was released in September 2019. Hereâ€™s Google explanation about this:

â€œWhen you search for things like how-to videos that have multiple steps, or long videos like speeches or a documentary, Search will provide links to key moments within the video based on timestamps provided by content creators.â€

How do you capture â€œkey momentsâ€ with your video? Youâ€™ll learn how in this tutorial. 

To conclude, itâ€™s estimated that video will represent 82% of ALL IP traffic in 2021. The fact that video is starting to dominate Googleâ€™s SERP is a good indicator that itâ€™s time to up your video SEO game.

title: SEO For Beginners: A Basic Search Engine Optimization Tutorial for Higher Google Rankings
description:
New to SEO? This tutorial shows you the basics of doing search engine optimization for your website to rank high in Google. 

Complete SEO Course for Beginners: Learn to Rank #1 in Google â–º https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xsVTqzratPs

First, what is SEO and how does it work?

SEO stands for search engine optimization. By definition, it is the process of optimizing your website and webpages to get â€œfreeâ€, â€œorganicâ€ traffic from search engines like Google, Yahoo and Bing.

As a business owner, blogger, or website owner, your job is two-fold: 

First, you need to make it easy for search engines to understand what your page is about and create content that matches what we call, the â€œsearcherâ€™s intent.â€ 

Second, you need to show Google and other search engines that your pages are â€˜worthyâ€™ of ranking.

In this video, Sam Oh teaches the a 101 into the world of search engine optimization.

There are plenty of clear examples and some basic (yet powerful) SEO tips to optimize a brand new website to rank #1 on Google (step-by-step).

The techniques that are taught in this SEO training include: 

1. Keyword research 
By doing keyword research, you can see the average number of times someone searches for a specific keyword phrase in Google each month.

Often times, the query that you think will be the most popular is often far from the truth.

Using tools like Ahrefs Keywords Explorer (https://ahrefs.com/keywords-explorer), youâ€™ll learn how to use the â€œparent topicâ€ of a term to determine the best keywords to target for your pages.

Youâ€™ll also learn what not to do (ie. keyword stuffing). 

Keyword research gives you clues on the language you should use to let both Google and potential customers know what our page is about.

There are a few vivid examples in here to illustrate the best practices on how to do keyword research. If you want to sharpen your keyword research skills, I highly recommend watching this series on doing keyword research in 2018 and beyond. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3zLBu_NfOaQ&list=PLvJ_dXFSpd2tIF-QrFD854Mnb8D4Av5vx

2. On-page SEO
On-page SEO is the process of optimizing web pages with the intention to rank high in Google. If you want to rank #1 on Google, then your on-page SEO will need to be right on.

In this tutorial, youâ€™ll learn 4 simple, yet highly effective tips to ensure you are following Google SEO best practices. Having optimized web pages will set the foundation for your success in search engine optimization.

It will help Google understand what your content is about and help your customers find you.

A few of the basic tips include:

- Title tags 
- Meta descriptions
- Heading tags (or H1 tags)
- keyword usage
- content creation
- competitor analysis

Learn more about our top 10 on-page SEO tips that actually work in 2018 and beyond. 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZWiNz-7gZ24&list=PLvJ_dXFSpd2s-OV4MiYXV8yhUjKYtW_bm&index=6

3. Off-page SEO
Off-page SEO is often referred to as link building.

Link building is the process of getting other websites to link to your web pages. 

Basically, links act as â€œvotesâ€ or other people vouching for your website.

Backlinks work in a similar way that you would refer your friend to buy a product from your favorite store because youâ€™ve tried it, used it, and loved it.

In general, the more quality backlinks you can get from relevant pages, the higher youâ€™ll rank in Google.

Sam will show you how to find backlink opportunities and the key technique that SEOs use to build links, which is through email outreach.

I highly recommend watching our video series on competitor backlink analysis and link building here: 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Io4ugroDedo&list=PLvJ_dXFSpd2vQNygbg5Uo1sMDs8aqRc4z

We also have another playlist on more "advanced" link building. 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ovu2ZYWgOJQ&list=PLvJ_dXFSpd2tjUTuAHpHidz5e2hAedP_m

Thereâ€™s a lot to learn with SEO marketing and we're constantly adding new tutorials to help you learn and execute SEO in effective ways.

title: How To Go From Zero to 100,000 Subscribers on YouTube - YouTube Unlocked - Module 1 - Lesson 1
description:
I'm really excited today because I'm going to teach you how to go from zero to 100,000 subscribers on YouTube. This is a two-week course, eight videos in total, actually six videos in total, sorry about that, and I'm going to end up breaking down everything you need to know about YouTube to start generating more traffic. The videos aren't too long. You'll get quite a bit of value from. All you have to do is follow along. 

RESOURCES & LINKS: 
____________________________________________
Download the Assets mentioned in this course: https://neilpatel.com/training/

Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLJR61fXkAx13HymYam75l8XRyayA3ail4&playnext=1&index=1
____________________________________________

Now, the key with YouTube is you have to create quality content that users want. If you don't, you won't get the subscribers, the traffic in the long run, and more importantly, all those video views won't convert into more leads or more sales. Hence the quality of the content is super important. 

When you think about YouTube, there's been quite a bit of evolution that's happened over the years, especially in the early years. It was founded in February 2005, started out as a dating website, believe it or not, then it transformed into a free video hosting platform. The first video ever uploaded was titled "Me at the Zoo". Most videos uploaded were short amateur videos, and Nike was the first major brand to post on YouTube. 

I have millions and millions of views in total. Heck, I'm getting over a million views a month. I don't even know how much watch time I'm at now, but my subscriber count's growing and growing, and I'm on my way to a million-plus subscribers. Not there yet, but getting pretty close. And if I can do this in a boring B2B space that most people don't care about, even though I don't find it boring and I do love marketing, in essence, anyone can do it. 

It's the second most popular social platform after Facebook as well. And when you think about YouTube, 90% of people say they discover new brands or products on YouTube. That's huge. And people are watching videos so much that every day, people watch 1 billion, literally 1 billion hours of videos on YouTube and they generate billions of views. That's a ton of engagement and those people are captivated. 

It's hard to build that much traffic. Hence you want to be on YouTube, because it allows you to tap into this whole new audience and generate more and more sales. 

Now, this course focuses on that 2 billion people that are on YouTube, and I'm going to show you the exact strategies, the hacks, the steps you need to take where you can leverage content on that platform and go from zero to 100,000 subscribers. 

If you already have more than 100,000 subscribers, like a million, this course probably isn't a good fit for you. It breaks down everything you need to know to get to that first 100,000 mark. 

And you need to first understand how YouTube works to be on your way so you can get there. With YouTube, you got to build your marketing strategy, create your channel, create videos of course, then optimize the videos for SEO. This is my favorite part. 

Most people rely on the suggestion videos. SEO can bring you very consistent traffic. Then you need to understand their analytics, and of course, you need to grow in the long term. And there's all these steps that are going to help you get that way. And I'm going to break them down over the next two weeks where I teach you how to go step by step to 100,000 followers. 

So I want you to go to neilpatel.com/training, where you can find all of these lessons and handouts and all that material. All you have to do is click on YouTube Unlocked and you'll see all the material there. 

Make sure you take your time. There's no rush. This course doesn't expire. It's free, doesn't cost a dime. Just take your time. If you don't have the time today to do it, you can always do it tomorrow or another day. 

And by the end of the course, you're going to know how to build amazing content and you're going to be able to grow your following to 100,000 subscribers and beyond. 

Thank you very much. If you enjoy this, make sure you subscribe. That way you can get the rest of the lessons, and when I mean subscribed, I'm talking about subscribing on Facebook, YouTube, or wherever you're watching this. 

It doesn't cost a dollar to watch this course or any of these lessons. It's fully free. If you have any questions, leave a comment. Tell your friends about this course. 

We're here to help you grow and succeed. Thank you for your time.

title: YouTube SEO Tips to Rank Your Videos #1
description:
Learn how to rank YouTube videos fast using our 7-step YouTube SEO process. These EXACT tips have increased our views by nearly 400% in 7.5 months.

***************************************
Video Marketing Resources

YouTube Keyword Research: How to Get More Views Consistently â–º https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kAuM2nQb_P8

How to Edit YouTube Videos for High Engagement â–º https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j5EOWffq-gk

Full YouTube SEO Blog Post â–º https://ahrefs.com/blog/youtube-seo/

***************************************

In a short period of time, we were able to rank our videos for some of the most popular keywords in our industry: 

#1 - Local SEO
#1 - Ecommerce SEO
#2 - SEO
#2 - search engine optimization

And the list goes on.

The best part about video SEO is that you donâ€™t need to have a massive channel to rank #1. You just need to entertain and engage your audience better than your competitors.

Follow everything from the basics and move to the advanced tips, which should help you rank your videos higher and faster.

First, what is YouTube SEO?

Itâ€™s the process of optimizing your videos, playlists, and channel to rank high in YouTubeâ€™s organic search results for a given search query.

Our data-driven strategy begins with YouTube Keyword Research.

A couple of free tools you can use are YouTube suggest, paired with Google trends. 

This is a great way to gauge a keywords popularity against other keywords. However, since Google trends shows relative popularity, it may not be the best way to find true search volumes.

Another tool you can use is Ahrefsâ€™ Keywords Explorer, which shows you search volume and clicks data for any keyword on YouTube.

This tool works perfectly when paired with Tubebuddy (most tagged videos section) or vidIQ (related keywords feature). 

While YouTube is the second largest search engine, you can also use other tools like Google search and Ahrefsâ€™ Content Explorer to rank your YouTube videos on the first page of Google search.

In fact, Google is our second largest source of external referral traffic.

This video covers all of the tactics, tips, and strategies to rank videos on Google.

The second step is to identify search intent.

Search intent represents the reason behind a searcherâ€™s query. To analyze search intent, just type your keyword into the YouTube search bar and see which videos are ranking in the top 3 positions. 

Take note of the format and angles other creators are taking and follow suit with your own video. 

Step 3 is the most important. And thatâ€™s to create a high-retention video. 

Engagement is arguably the most important ranking factor in YouTubeâ€™s algorithm. If you canâ€™t engage your audience, then you probably wonâ€™t rank.

This can be measured in YouTube Studio analytics by looking at the audience retention graph. Youâ€™ll learn EXACTLY how we consistently create high-retention videos from our planning to editing processes.

Step 4 is to do on-page video optimizations.

This boils down to the title, description, thumbnail, and meta data like YouTube tags. Youâ€™ll learn how to optimize your videos following YouTubeâ€™s best practices.

Step 5 are in-video optimizations.

YouTube allows you to add subtitles or closed captions (CC) to your videos. This helps bring context to your videos which can be helpful when trying to rank your videos. 

Youâ€™ll also learn a couple engagement hacks using YouTube cards and end-screens. 

Step 6 is to publish and promote your video

Whether you have a massive audience or tiny one, youâ€™ll learn how to promote your videos to get more views fast.

Step 7 is to optimize your videos (and channel) for session watch time. 

Session watch time is the total time a viewer watches videos on YouTube without leaving the platform.

YouTube said on their creator blog that they use this metric as a ranking factor in their search and discovery algorithm.

Our channel playlist hack will help you do just that.

Timestamps:

1:04 What is YouTube SEO
1:52 YouTube keyword research
5:52 Identify userâ€™s search intent
6:34 Create high-retention videos
9:26 On-page optimization for videos
13:01 In-video optimizations
14:24 Publish and promote your video
15:39 Optimize your video for session watch time
17:24 Samâ€™s channel page hack

title: How To Best Write YouTube Tags for SEO Results (2016)

title: ğŸ”¥ 5 Best Tools For SEO | Top 5 SEO Tools For 2026 #Shorts #simplilearn
description:
In this video on 5 Best Tools For SEO, we dive into the world of SEO by exploring the five best tools every digital marketer should have in their toolkit. First up is Google Analytics, an essential tool for tracking website traffic and user behavior. It provides valuable insights into how visitors interact with your site, helping you understand which pages are performing well and where improvements are needed. This data-driven approach ensures you can make informed decisions to enhance user experience and boost your site's performance.

Next, we look at Google Search Console, a vital tool for monitoring website performance and addressing indexing issues. It helps ensure your site appears correctly in search results, providing you with detailed reports on search queries, clicks, and indexing status. Additionally, Ahrefs stands out for its powerful backlink analysis and competitive research capabilities. By giving you a clear view of your site's link profile and competitor strategies, Ahrefs enables you to develop effective link-building campaigns and stay ahead in the competitive SEO landscape.

SEMrush is another indispensable tool, renowned for its comprehensive keyword research and tracking features. It allows you to optimize your content for better visibility by identifying high-performing keywords and tracking their rankings. Finally, Yoast SEO is a must-have for WordPress users, offering an intuitive interface for optimizing on-page SEO. It makes it easier to enhance your site's search engine performance by guiding you through the process of improving meta tags, content readability, and overall SEO best practices. Together, these tools provide a robust foundation for any successful SEO strategy.


#SEO #SearchEngineOptimization #Salary #DigitalMarketing #DigitalMarketingTutorial #Learn #2026 #DigitalMarketing  #Shorts #YTShorts #Simplilearn

âœ… What is the main purpose of Google Analytics?
Answer: Google Analytics is primarily used to track website traffic and user behavior, providing insights into how visitors interact with your site. This helps you understand which pages are performing well and where improvements are needed.

âœ… How does Google Search Console help with SEO?
Answer: Google Search Console helps monitor website performance and address indexing issues, ensuring your site appears correctly in search results. It provides detailed reports on search queries, clicks, and indexing status.

âœ… Why is Yoast SEO important for WordPress sites?
Answer: Yoast SEO is essential for optimizing on-page SEO for WordPress sites. It offers an intuitive interface and guides you through the process of improving meta tags, content readability, and overall SEO best practices, enhancing your site's search engine performance.

title: How To Go From Zero to 100,000 Subscribers on YouTube - YouTube Unlocked - Module 1 - Lesson 1
description:
I'm really excited today because I'm going to teach you how to go from zero to 100,000 subscribers on YouTube. This is a two-week course, eight videos in total, actually six videos in total, sorry about that, and I'm going to end up breaking down everything you need to know about YouTube to start generating more traffic. The videos aren't too long. You'll get quite a bit of value from. All you have to do is follow along. 

RESOURCES & LINKS: 
____________________________________________
Download the Assets mentioned in this course: https://neilpatel.com/training/

Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLJR61fXkAx13HymYam75l8XRyayA3ail4&playnext=1&index=1
____________________________________________

Now, the key with YouTube is you have to create quality content that users want. If you don't, you won't get the subscribers, the traffic in the long run, and more importantly, all those video views won't convert into more leads or more sales. Hence the quality of the content is super important. 

When you think about YouTube, there's been quite a bit of evolution that's happened over the years, especially in the early years. It was founded in February 2005, started out as a dating website, believe it or not, then it transformed into a free video hosting platform. The first video ever uploaded was titled "Me at the Zoo". Most videos uploaded were short amateur videos, and Nike was the first major brand to post on YouTube. 

I have millions and millions of views in total. Heck, I'm getting over a million views a month. I don't even know how much watch time I'm at now, but my subscriber count's growing and growing, and I'm on my way to a million-plus subscribers. Not there yet, but getting pretty close. And if I can do this in a boring B2B space that most people don't care about, even though I don't find it boring and I do love marketing, in essence, anyone can do it. 

It's the second most popular social platform after Facebook as well. And when you think about YouTube, 90% of people say they discover new brands or products on YouTube. That's huge. And people are watching videos so much that every day, people watch 1 billion, literally 1 billion hours of videos on YouTube and they generate billions of views. That's a ton of engagement and those people are captivated. 

It's hard to build that much traffic. Hence you want to be on YouTube, because it allows you to tap into this whole new audience and generate more and more sales. 

Now, this course focuses on that 2 billion people that are on YouTube, and I'm going to show you the exact strategies, the hacks, the steps you need to take where you can leverage content on that platform and go from zero to 100,000 subscribers. 

If you already have more than 100,000 subscribers, like a million, this course probably isn't a good fit for you. It breaks down everything you need to know to get to that first 100,000 mark. 

And you need to first understand how YouTube works to be on your way so you can get there. With YouTube, you got to build your marketing strategy, create your channel, create videos of course, then optimize the videos for SEO. This is my favorite part. 

Most people rely on the suggestion videos. SEO can bring you very consistent traffic. Then you need to understand their analytics, and of course, you need to grow in the long term. And there's all these steps that are going to help you get that way. And I'm going to break them down over the next two weeks where I teach you how to go step by step to 100,000 followers. 

So I want you to go to neilpatel.com/training, where you can find all of these lessons and handouts and all that material. All you have to do is click on YouTube Unlocked and you'll see all the material there. 

Make sure you take your time. There's no rush. This course doesn't expire. It's free, doesn't cost a dime. Just take your time. If you don't have the time today to do it, you can always do it tomorrow or another day. 

And by the end of the course, you're going to know how to build amazing content and you're going to be able to grow your following to 100,000 subscribers and beyond. 

Thank you very much. If you enjoy this, make sure you subscribe. That way you can get the rest of the lessons, and when I mean subscribed, I'm talking about subscribing on Facebook, YouTube, or wherever you're watching this. 

It doesn't cost a dollar to watch this course or any of these lessons. It's fully free. If you have any questions, leave a comment. Tell your friends about this course. 

We're here to help you grow and succeed. Thank you for your time.


â–º If you need help growing your business check out my ad agency Neil Patel Digital https://npdigital.com/

â–ºSubscribe: https://goo.gl/ScRTwc to learn more secret SEO tips.
â–ºFind me on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/neilkpatel/
â–ºOn Instagram: https://instagram.com/neilpatel/

title: What is SEO & How to Earn as SEO Expert? | Hafiz Ahmed Podcast
description:
Welcome to an exciting episode of the Hafiz Ahmed Podcast, featuring a special guest, Tanveer Nandla. Get ready to dive into the world of digital marketing and entrepreneurship as Tanveer shares his wealth of knowledge and experiences.

Tanveer Nandla is a highly respected digital marketer, entrepreneur, and digital trainer based in Pakistan. title: YouTube SEO: How to Rank YouTube Videos in 2020
description:
Want to learn how to rank YouTube videos? Iâ€™ll walk you through 7 YouTube SEO tips to help you rank your videos on YouTube and Google. Through keyword research, video optimization, and other video SEO tips youâ€™ll learn how to rank your YouTube videos fast.

Do YouTube Tags Help You Get More Views in 2020?
https://youtu.be/ao6oQu8zKTI

Canva Tutorial for Beginners: How to Use Canva in 2020
https://youtu.be/NXD7xrztokA

Free YouTube SEO Tools
VidIQ: https://vidiq.com
Ahrefs YouTube Keyword Tool: https://ahrefs.com/youtube-keyword-tool

Camera and gear used to record this video
https://kit.co/jeffthelen/my-youtube-video-kit

Timestamps â±
0:00 YouTube SEO introduction
1:10 Find topics with high search volume
6:42 Tell YouTube what your video is about
8:42 Get people to click on your videos (CTR)
9:38 Keep people watching videos on YouTube
11:34 Get people to interact with your content
12:56 Embed your videos on your website
13:57 Drive traffic to your videos in the first 24 hours

7 YouTube Video SEO Tips:

1. Find topics with high search volume through keyword research. You can see how I performed keyword research for my recent Canva Tutorial for Beginners video by using VidIQ and Ahrefs.

2. Tell YouTube what your video is about. By using the keyword and other similar phrases in the video title, description, and tags, you help YouTubeâ€™s algorithm understand what your video is about so it knows who to initially show your video to.

3. Get people to click on your videos. Click through rate (CTR) is one of the most important YouTube metrics. No one can watch your video if they donâ€™t first click on it. Spend a lot of time on your video thumbnail and title so when people see your video in search results or suggested video they want to click on your video.

4. Keep people watching videos on YouTube. Watch time is as important at CTR. You need to keep people on YouTube watching your video and ideally additional videos before ending their YouTube session. You canâ€™t see this in YouTube Studio / YouTube analytics but YouTube measures session time (how long someone spends on YouTube in 1 session). Use cards and end screens to recommend other content to keep viewers watching more of your content back to back. If you can help YouTube keep viewers on YouTube longer, youâ€™ll be rewarded with more views on your videos. 

5. Get people to interact with your content. When you get someone to like, comment, or subscribe while watching one of your videos, that sends a signal to YouTube that people enjoy your content. If itâ€™s clear that people enjoy consuming your content, YouTube will find more people to show your videos to.

6. Embed your videos on your website. A study done by Briggsby (https://www.briggsby.com/reverse-engineering-youtube-search) found that the more links or embeds a video had, the higher it ranked in YouTube search results. Create blog posts on your website and embed your YouTube videos.

7. Drive as much traffic to your videos within the first 24-48 hours of publishing. Share your videos in the community tab if you have over 1,000 subscribers. Share your YouTube videos to your email list. Share your videos on all of your social media channels such as Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, and Pinterest. Also, you can share your videos on forums such as Quora or Reddit.

CÃ³mo Tener MÃ¡s Vistas En Tus Videos de YouTube - YouTube SEO
description:
En este video te dirÃ© cÃ³mo tener mÃ¡s vistas en YouTube, algunas estrategias para crecer tu canal y cÃ³mo mejorar tus videos para tener mÃ¡s vistas.

TheFigCo Online
Website:â€‹ â€‹https://www.thefigco.com/es/inicio
Facebook:â€‹ â€‹https://www.facebook.com/thefigcoes
Instagram:â€‹ â€‹https://www.instagram.com/thefigco_es
Pinterest:â€‹ â€‹https://www.pinterest.com/thefigco
Instagram de Laura:â€‹ â€‹https://www.instagram.com/laura_figueroab/

Para crecer en YouTube, necesitas tener mÃ¡s visitas en tus videos de YouTube, por eso en este video te voy a decir quÃ© debes tomar en cuenta para que tus videos lleguen a tu audiencia adecuada y tengan el impacto deseado. Obtener mÃ¡s visitas en YouTube no es tan difÃ­cil si sigues la estrategia adecuada para crecer en YouTube.

Si se te dificulta tener vistas en tus videos, lo primero que debes entender es que la mÃ©trica en la que te debes enfocar es en el CTR (El nÃºmero de clics que obtiene un enlance, en este caso tus videos de YouTube). Debes incrementar tu CTR, aquÃ­ te dirÃ© cÃ³mo hacer esto para tener mÃ¡s vistas en tus videos.

El thumbnail es un elemento esencial para que las personas de click sobre tu video. Es la imagen que destaca y el primer contacto que la gente tiene con tu video. Cuando tu imagen miniatura es mÃ¡s llamativa por sobre los otros videos, es mÃ¡s probable que las personas den click a tu video, ademÃ¡s de las keywords que debes usar para hacer saber a tu audiencia que lo que estÃ¡ en tu video es el contenido que ellos buscan. Cuando tu thumbnail empiece a destacar, harÃ¡s que tu contenido tenga mayor CTR, o sea, mayor visitas en tus videos.

Otro punto a tomar en cuenta de tus videos, es el tÃ­tulo, este debe contener las keywords adecuadas, o sea las palabras que las personas estÃ¡n buscando respecto al tema de tu video. Para aumentar la vista de tus videos, es elemental que puedas posicionar tu video con palabras claves o keywords. Existen herramientas como VidIQ, que ayudan a saber quÃ© palabras usar para tus tags y tÃ­tulos de videos.

El siguiente punto a tomar en cuenta para tener mÃ¡s visitas en tus videos, es el watchtime. Ã‰ste es muy importante pues te indica, cuÃ¡nta retenciÃ³n tienen tus videos y esto para YouTube es muy importante pues le indica si tu contenido es de valor para las personas. Puedes mejorar tus videos de YouTube, al estructurar el contenido e ir directo a la idea o al tema principal. No uses introducciones muy largas, pues harÃ¡s que las personas se salgan del video y por ende tu canal no crezca de manera rÃ¡pida.

title: honest product review ğŸ¤” The Crunch cup ğŸ¥¤ #cerealcup #crunchcup #review #reviews #productreview
Laundry Detergent Sheets Reviewed #laundry #productreviews
description:
I'm a 4th generation dry cleaner who reviews laundry detergents and detergent sheets (yes literally all of them) are NOT worth it!!!

While laundry detergent sheets may seem like a dream come true, they fall flat where it matters mostâ€”cleaning your clothes. Despite the sustainable packaging, they perform poorly, cost more than you'd expect, and heavily lean on your desire to be eco-friendly without delivering real results. I donâ€™t recommend them. In my opinion they are the result of marketing greenwashing preying on your good hearted sustainable mindset. 

I've tested about a dozen brands; they're all trash. I tested big name brands, viral brands, small business brands and not a single one is worth it. They clean poorly, are pretty expensive, and have very few benefits.

If you're looking for sustainable packaging, look for powdered products in cardboard. If it's portability you're after, give pods a try. Also the Tide Evo tile is a fantastic product that excels in all of these categories. 

I hope you find this review helpful!

For more laundry tips and tricks check out my AI: askjeevesny.com

You can also support us by purchasing me and my dad's laundry book (makes for a great gift): https://geni.us/LaundryBook

For Serious Business Inquiries,
Contact Me Here: pilar@pilarnewman.com 
-------------------------------------------------------------
ğŸŸ¡ About This Video:

There are many routes you can take to become an Amazon product tester that will get you free or discounted Amazon products.

In some cases, you can even get paid from Amazon for reviewing products that customers end up purchasing through your efforts. 

This is called affiliate marketing and is a program conducted through the Amazon Associates and Influencer program. 

If you decide that being an Amazon product tester is something you want to do full-time, then consider applying to these Amazon Creator paid programs (more about that later on!).

Itâ€™s one neat way to get paid for your Amazon product reviews and earn a side hustle income!

What is an Amazon Product Tester?

An Amazon product tester reviews products sold on Amazon. In general, product testers do this in order to obtain free or heavily discounted Amazon products. Although, you are not required to leave a review in order to receive these products.

Itâ€™s important to note that an Amazon product tester job is not a position offered directly by Amazon. 

Being aware of this will help you avoid product tester job scams that are posted and promoted all over social media.

Instead many third-party companies, such as Rebaid, will partner with Amazon sellers to provide product awareness for newly launched Amazon products. 

Amazon sellers benefit greatly from these services by getting sales to their recently released product on Amazon. 

Additionally, it helps sellers generate their first few Amazon product reviews, which is crucial to their success on Amazon.

You benefit by getting Amazon products for free or at a significant discount to test out these new products on Amazon.
----------------------------------------------------------

Speed review of popular skin care products | dermatologist opines
description:
Explanation here ğŸ‘‡

âœ…Cetaphil gentle cleanser :
Works for most skin types also in sensitive skin. 
If you have oily skin then use cetaphil oc for better results 

âŒThe ordinary AHA BHA peeling solution 
This is a very popular product but not for Indian skin. The concentration of acids is too high for our skin type and climate. Whenever you undergo a peeling session with this, you have to follow strict sun protection for atleast a week along with intense moisturization. Otherwise there will be dark spots left behind. I will not recommend 
ğŸ‘©â€âš•ï¸ replace with a 10% -AHA peeling solution 

âœ…Minimalist SPF 50 sunscreen
 This is a good sunscreen if you like a light weight non sticky sunscreen with no white cast. It has spf 50 and PA 4+ . UV filters are uvinul T, avobenzone, octocrylene and titanium dioxide. 

âŒMinimalist nonapeptide + AHA 
It is marketed for lightening underarms darkness and reducing odour. It didnâ€™t work in odour at all. 
ğŸ‘©â€âš•ï¸better to use a benzoyl peroxide soap for odour. 

âŒAuravedic kumkumadi toner 
Toner is general is completely avoidable but these ones donâ€™t work 
ğŸ‘©â€âš•ï¸look for greens tea or rose water in your toner 

âŒBiotique sun shield sunscreen ultra protective lotion 
Not a fan of the product, the texture,  the ingredients  and how it feels. 
ğŸ‘©â€âš•ï¸there are many better sunscreen 

âœ…Fixderma Shadow SPF 50+ 
A good sunscreen for those with oily acne prone skin. It has a light gel based texture. Leaves no white cast 

âœ…Forest essential facial tonic mist 
Those who like toners or mist, this is a good refreshing option which actually makes skin look better.

title: HUDA BEAUTY BLUSH FILTER PALETTES: YAY OR NAY? ğŸ¤”#blush #hudabeautylipstick #productreview
This Torras Q3 Air iPhone 17 Case Looks Amazingâ€¦But Performs Terribly
description:
Iâ€™m not going to lie..this is a pretty cool-looking case. Bright colors, fun design, way different from the typical boring clear cases and black bricks. But once you get past the looks, the TORRAS Ostand Q3 Air has a long way to go when it comes to actual protection. Letâ€™s talk about it.

Get your own TORRAS Ostand Q3 Air for iPhone 17 Pro Case with 360 Magnetic Stand, Fit for MagSafe, Mil-Grade Drop Tested, Camera Control Button, Shockproof Phone Case by using this link: https://mreh.ca/3JFGvg6
*This is an Amazon affiliate link that will bring you to the right Amazon store for your location

#ReviewerNotInfluencer #Reviews #iPhone

In this video:
0:00 Intro
0:30 Design
1:40 Handling & Usability
2:52 Protection Features
3:25 Drop Protection
5:12 Should You Get It?

TORRAS Ostand Q3 Air for iPhone 17 Pro Case with 360 Magnetic Stand, Fit for MagSafe, Mil-Grade Drop Tested, Camera Control Button, Shockproof Phone Case Review

-i don't even know where to start with this case design wise
-there's giant air pockets along the top and bottom of the case
-the PC back has a frosted finish that has a bit of tack to it
-the edge has 2-3 types of TPU I think
-this frosted stuff, the air pocket stuff and the bright blue stuff
-lots of stuff
-Torras has added a ton of prints to the case which seem extraneous
-prints like this corner thing that looks like the feet you'd find on other cases
-this case has this annoying stand build into it
-I really don't like this
-BUT with Torras newer cases, they have a rotating stand which works way better
-now visually, you'd think this case is super grippy
-it has a TPU edge
-there's these grip strips
-BUT the reality is the case is super slick
-almost handles like a wet bar of soap
-the only saving grace are the air pockets that have a tacky finish to it
-case is going to add 53g to your iPhone, which is pretty average
-bulk wise, going to increase the size of your iPhone by 71%
-alright, for drop protection,
-Torras claims this case has a 100% rebound rate
-so somehow these plastic airbags defy the laws of physics
-or Torras has magically developed a system were there is no energy loss?

-the intial impact at the corners at 3ft was 11.0N
-that's 14% higher than average
-now despite the airbags, the case didn't rotate as much as I thought
-because the rotation rate was average
-when it came to settling down, the rate was 55% faster than average
-and because of that the total force going into the iPhone was a hair below average
-so is this a good result?
-I don't think so
-a good case dampens the drop, the air bags on this case act like springs
-the only thing the air bags are good for is preventing the case from looking damaged which is what most case manufacturers are going for

-for face drops
-the edges of this case have very little flex
-so it passes
-intial impact is 42% lower
-settling rate is 34% better
-and the total force is 14% lower for face first drops

-marvelous!

-for the camera lump, Torras only has the PC back around it
-though it looks like it's multiple layers
-which helps because
-the initial I'm pact is 30% lower
-but because it its a PC back, the settling rate is 7% worse
-BUT the overall force is 15% lower than average

-so the case is decent for face and camera lump drops
-but given corner drops are the most common, the high initial impact for each drop is worrisome for me
-corners on the case are big at 3.7mm
-mind you most of the corner is air
-the back is 2.9mm thick which is a hair above average 
-for rigidity
-this case was average
-which is neat to see because the stand is baked into the back
-for magsafe, takes 7.1N to pull, 6.9 to push
-that's 30% below average
-these magnets are so weak that I'd be wary using a simple wallet on it...
-maybe I got a bad case because what I see is far from whatever 18N marketing fluff torras touts
-case has flow thru buttons 
-there's a bit of lateral wiggle that's a bit more noticeable compared to other Torras cases
-prot cutout can handle any size cable
-and is pretty comfortable for the pinky
-screen access is great because of the super low edges

title: Don't Buy Food Storage Containers Until You Watch This (7 Brands Tested)
description:
Which food storage containers are the best? To find out, I put seven popular sets to the test, including Rubbermaid EasyFindLids, Amazon Basics, Rubbermaid Brilliance, Pyrex Snapware Total Solution, OXO Good Grips Smart Seal, Pyrex Ultimate, and Caraway. I tested each container for leaks by shaking it upside down with water inside, and for airtightness by submerging it in water and checking for bubbles. I microwaved tomato sauce to see if it stained, stored garlic to test for lingering odors, froze them overnight to check for warping or cracking, and baked them in the oven if they were labeled oven-safe. I also opened and closed each one 300 times to see how the latches held up. Youâ€™ll see which containers passed, which failed, and what features matter the most when picking out food storage containers.

The review should include information on the productâ€™s features and benefits, as well as how it fares against similar products from competitors. The review should also include customer experiences and opinions, so itâ€™s helpful to include a variety of customer experiences to provide a balanced and comprehensive picture. Additionally, reviews should be timely, taking into account any updates or changes that have been made since its original release.

It has great features:
Advanced AI Obstacle Avoidance: The Narwal robot vacuum uses dual RGB cameras with AI chips to identify 200+ household objects. It avoids pet accidents with a 150mm buffer, navigates within 8mm of furniture, and reacts instantly to hazards for reliable, precise cleaning.
Edge-to-Corner Mop Coverage: This mop robot extends and swings its mop to clean edges, corners, and under toe-kicks. With 8N downward pressure, it scrubs away tough messes in hard-to-reach areas, ensuring complete coverage.
Quiet Self-Emptying Base with Hot-Water Wash: The self-emptying dock quietly maintains the mop with 104â€“140Â°F hot-water washing, finishes with a 167Â°F rinse, and dries automatically to prevent odors. A 2.5L dust bag stores up to 120 days of debris, making this self emptying robot vacuum cleaner easy to maintain.
18,000Pa Suction with Tangle-Free Brush: Delivering 18,000Pa suction, the Narwal vacuum robot captures dust, crumbs, and pet hair with ease. A certified tangle-free brush plus EdgeSwing technology ensures deep cleaning along walls and edges without hair wrap.
DualFlow Anti-Tangle System: The vacuum mop robotâ€™s DualFlow system prevents brush clogs. Side brushes sweep hair into the roller, and a strong suction burst transfers it directly into the dustbin â€” reducing tangles and minimizing post-cleaning work.
Real-Time Adaptive Cleaning: Dual AI chips let this robotic vacuum cleaner analyze dirt instantly and switch between vacuuming and mopping. Cross-pattern cleaning handles spills, dust, and footprints for consistently clean floors.
Smart App & Pet Mode: Control the Narwal cleaning robot via app or voice assistant for flexible cleaning. Pet Mode detects pets in real time, avoids disturbing them, and supports live video check-ins â€” ideal for families with pets.

description:
Want to display WooCommerce reviews where they convert best. In this step by step I show how to turn on reviews in WooCommerce, add review blocks or shortcodes to product pages and landing pages, and style the stars so they match your theme. You will learn how to show verified badges, enable photo and video reviews, add a review summary bar, and output Review Schema for rich results on Google. Everything uses free tools, no paid plugins, works with Gutenberg or Elementor, desktop and mobile.

What you will learn
â€¢ Enable product reviews and star ratings in WooCommerce settings
â€¢ Add reviews to any page with blocks or shortcodes, place near the Buy button
â€¢ Collect more reviews with follow up email and coupon incentives
â€¢ Show photo or video reviews, filter by rating, sort by most helpful

Bambu Lab H2C 3D Printer Review: Vortek Tested!
description:
We test and review the most advanced filament 3D printer made by Bambu Lab: the H2C. Equipped with their Vortek hotend swapping system, this dual extruder machine can handily switch between up to seven colors without wasteful filament flushing. We examine the new Vortek hotends up close to dissect how the system works, observe where it can be optimized, and show off some test prints!

Find Bambu Lab printers here: https://www.matterhackers.com/store/c/3d-printers/bambu-lab-3d-printers?aff=7553
Disclosure: This product was sent to us by the manufacturer for purposes of review and is not sponsored. 

Shot by Josh Self and edited by Norman Chan

Wonders of Italy | Most Beautiful Places - Travel Video
description: Across a relatively small stretch of southern Europe lies a country where some of the worldâ€™s most recognizable destinations sit only a few hours apart. What makes them remarkable is not just their beauty, but the very different stories behind them. A single trip can move from ancient streets that have been walked for two thousand years, to coastal roads carved into cliffs, to islands that once hosted emperors and traders from far beyond the Mediterranean.

bre in europe continues and this time we are in FRANCE ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡· it is my FIRST time in france (actually i went to Nice for a week before this but idk if im posting a vlog for that ... you will have to stay tuned) and i had such a fun time with my bestie @okay.ainsley we were truly biking all over paris without a strict itinerary. i had lots of yummy french food, went to the louvre, reveled at the eiffel tower many times, experienced the french bike culture and so much more ğŸš²

In todayâ€™s vlog, something truly unexpected happened in Trinidad! I met a Malayali priest who is also a passionate farmerâ€”living a peaceful, grounded life thousands of kilometres away from Kerala. He welcomed me to his farm, shared his journey, and gave me a beautiful glimpse of how Malayali culture thrives even abroad.

After that heartwarming encounter, I headed to the world-famous Pitch Lake, the largest natural asphalt deposit on Earth. Walking on this bubbling, ever-moving landscape felt like stepping onto another planet!

Join me as I explore unique cultures, surprising connections, and incredible natural wonders in Trinidad. ğŸŒâ¤ï¸

Toronto is one of the fastest-growing cities in North America, and the biggest city in Canada. It has a booming population and an ever-growing skyline, with 70 skyscrapers springing up within the last decade and even more still being built. It's also the most diverse city in the entire world, with just about 50% of the population born outside Canada. All this makes Toronto an incredibly interesting place to visit and eat. And it might just turn your preconceived notions about Canada â€” and what it means to be Canadian â€” upside down.

Sierra Madre: Luzonâ€™s Natural Shield | The Devastation of Typhoon Uwan at Ampere Beach
description:
Super Typhoon Uwan hit Aurora with destructive winds and massive waves, completely wiping out a section of the coastal road in Ampere Beach, Dipaculao, Aurora.

In this documentary, we explore the aftermath, the science behind why the damage was so severe, and the role of the Sierra Madre â€” often called Luzonâ€™s â€œnatural shield.â€

title: 3 Days in Bangkok Thailand ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡­ Best Thai Food, Cafe Hopping, Shopping Malls, Thailand Travel Vlog
description:
Need an eSIM? 
Download #Airalo today and use our code RALPHSAM3 at check out for $3 off your first #eSIM: https://www.airalo.com/?code=RALPHSAM3

Our Ultimate Travel Guide to Bangkok, Thailand! We're back in Bangkok this summer to explore all the best things to see and places to visit in the Thai capital.

Planning a trip to Bangkok? Check out our 3 Day Bangkok Travel Itinerary:

Day 1: After an Eastern Thai dinner and checking into our hotel, we spend our first morning exploring the best cafes in Bangkok's Ekkamai district. Then we revisit our favorite Thai food spots in Bangkok, starting at one of the best restaurants in Central Embassy. The rest of the afternoon is for shopping and Thai massages before dinner at a Michelin Guide favorite, Polo Fried Chicken.

Day 2:
More Cafe hopping before spending the day at one Bangkok's most popular shopping malls, Icon Siam. Its Souk Food Court is a must-visit for Thai street food. Lunch is at a legendary Pad Thai restuarant and dinner is at a Michelin Northern Thai restaurant.

Day 3:
After having the best brunch in Bangkok and checking out a must-try Thai cafe, we explore more of Bangkok's best luxury malls, have dinner at a Michelin Chicken Rice shop, and even pass by a festival honoring the country's unique Thai fruits.

Join us next week for more of our Thailand Travels!

Shot in May 2025

title: Learn English Through My Trip to London ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ | Comprehensible Input
description:
See ALL my videos here ğŸ‘‰ https://sproutlanguage.com/


Learn English naturally with this travel vlog as I explore London and my hometown in York â€” teaching real-life English through conversations, street scenes, and family moments (using comprehensible input).

In this video, weâ€¦
 1. Learn 30+ everyday English words and expressions from real life in London â€” including transport, sightseeing, and family talk.
 2. Explore famous streets and quiet corners, learning natural ways to describe what you see, do, and feel in British English.
 3. Spend time with my uncle and chat casually, helping you understand real conversation rhythms and common vocabulary.

Bonus: Watch cinematic scenes of London life and get English explanations that make it easier to remember and speak fluently.

Timestamps:
00:00-06:38: Danang to London 
06:38 - 10:26: London to home

â¸»

A Snowy Winter Trip to Hokkaido | 10-Day Itinerary in Sapporo, Otaru, Asahikawa & Biei | JAPAN VLOG
description:
Spending 10 snowy days in Hokkaido â„ï¸âœ¨ Exploring Sapporo, Otaru, Asahikawa, and Biei, I visited cozy cafes, tried amazing local food (including Genghis Khan BBQ, Soup curry and omakase sushi ğŸ£), and wandered through charming streets covered in snow. From the famous Sapporo Snow Festival to the glass and music box shops of Otaru, this trip was a mix of exploring new places and relaxing moments. Join me as I share my itinerary, favourite spots, and the best places to eat, shop, and explore in Hokkaido in winter!

title: MAUA NUSA PENIDA ! RESORT TERBAIK DI NUSA PENIDA BALI #travelvlog #nusapenidabali #bali
description: Nusa Penida adalah pulau keren di tenggara Bali, terbesar di antara Nusa Lembongan dan Nusa Ceningan. Dengan tebing batu kapur, pantai epik, dan pemandangan keren, tempat ini populer di Instagram. Snorkeling di sini keren banget, ada manta ray dan terumbu karang warna-warni. Ada Atuh Beach dan Crystal Bay, tempat sunset terbaik. Untuk kesana harus nyeberang pake boat jarak 45 menit dari pulau Bali.

description: Comprised of 50 states, the USA occupies an area thatâ€™s only just marginally smaller than Europe. Itâ€™s in this vast country that you will find an unbelievably diverse array of natural landscapes, cityscapes, people and cultures. From the tropical islands of Hawaii to the desert landscape of the Grand Canyon, as well as the multicultural cities such as Chicago and New York City, youâ€™ll never be stuck for destinations to discover. Hereâ€™s a look at the best places to visit in the USA:

title: Puthettu #puthettu travel vlog #happyfishingfoursvlog #puthettu # #song #love #music
The Australia Travel Vlog ft. @JaspritBumrah1993  , Tilak Varma, Shivam Dube and more
description:
Join Suryakumar Yadav as he kicks off the travel journey to Australia for the T20 series! âœˆï¸ From vlogging the fun airport vibes during their singapore layover, to behind-the-scenes moments with teammates, this vlog captures the perfect mix of fun, cricket and friendship.

You will catch SKY travelling to Canberra alongside Jasprit Bumrah, Tilak Varma and Shivam Dube. They run into influencer Nisman Parpia during their travel. Once they land in Australia, Surya takes you through the squadâ€™s prep mood, banter between the teammates and the energy of heading into a big series. Ending with Tilak Varma's Birthday celebrations in the team room. Expect real, unfiltered moments.

During the vlog, keep an eye out for special cameos by Rinku Singh, Jitesh Sharma and Kuldeep Yadav who drop in with their trademark humour and warmth, making their free-time in Australia even more memorable.

And donâ€™t miss the ending- an exclusive clip from Tilak Varmaâ€™s cake-cutting celebration ğŸ°ğŸ‰ A wholesome, fun end to an action-packed match day.

If you enjoy team vibes, behind-the-scenes camaraderie and the excitement of an international tour, this oneâ€™s for you.

Like, share, and subscribe for more exclusive cricket content! ğŸ”¥
